page.title: 15CATON LEISURE CLUB
page.content: The Local History group is unearthing a great deal of information from members' attics e.g.one member is collecting field names from local farmers for comparison with early maps.During the summer we have occasional Geology, Local History and Sketching field trips and recently have been given permission to use Moor Platt grounds for croquet and bowls.Twice a year all groups meet for a party and we have occasional exhibitions of members'work. None of this would have been possible without the help and encouragement of a great many people in this very friendly village.Organisations have helped too especially the village magazine "The Link" and the Parish Council. Natives and Â£off-comers' work well together. We make many friends,learn new skills and enjoy ourselves.
